Installation
============

To use OptiCommPy, you can install it using pip:

.. code-block:: console

   $ pip install OptiCommPy


or cloning the repository from GitHub:

.. code-block:: console

   $ git clone https://github.com/edsonportosilva/OptiCommPy.git
   $ cd OptiCommPy
   $ python setup.py install
